name: posthog
description: PostHog is an open-source product analytics suite with heatmaps, session recording, event tracking, and feature flags. It's self-hostable or cloud-based, offering privacy-friendly data ownership for growth teams.

features.title: Event Tracking
features.description: Capture user interactions with flexible event instrumentation supporting both autocapture and manual tracking to analyze

features.title: Session Replay
features.description: Record and replay user sessions to understand navigation flows, identify friction points, and debug issues

features.title: A/b Testing
features.description: Run controlled experiments with multivariate testing capabilities to validate hypotheses and optimize features based on

features.title: Feature Flags
features.description: Deploy features progressively with dynamic flag management, enabling gradual rollouts, targeted releases, and instant rollbacks

features.title: Funnel Analysis
features.description: Visualize conversion paths and identify drop-off points across multi-step user journeys to optimize critical flows

features.title: Cohort Analysis
features.description: Segment users into behavioral cohorts and track retention, engagement, and conversion metrics over time to

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Build tailored visualizations with drag-and-drop widgets, SQL queries, and real-time data updates to monitor KPIs

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with third-party tools via REST APIs, webhooks, and native integrations to centralize data and
